title: How much money has Samsung made from iPhones? - Quora

response.answer_text: It has been thrown out on the Internet that Samsung makes more money from selling phone parts, especially screens, than it makes from selling its own phones. Supposedly Samsung makes a lot of money selling screens to Apple. Supposedly Apple has not been successful in finding another manufacturer who can make screens as good as Samsung can Lots of supposedly in the above paragraph. Does anybody know if Samsung actually releases enough data to know if any of the supposedly things are true.
